hero.tagline: Built in Nairobi. Ready for the World.
hero.description: 48 hours of innovation, collaboration, and building solutions that matter.

about.title: Why JengaHacks?
about.subtitle: We're building the future of Kenyan technology, one hack at a time.

build.title: Build & Ship
build.description: 48 hours to turn your ideas into working prototypes with mentorship from industry experts.

network.title: Network
network.description: Connect with fellow developers, designers, and entrepreneurs from across East Africa.

win.title: Win Big
win.description: Compete for prizes, mentorship opportunities, and the glory of it all.

learn.title: Learn & Grow
learn.description: Workshops, talks, and hands-on sessions with leading tech companies and innovators.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Connect with participants, mentors, and organizers on Discord. Get updates, ask questions, and network!

registration.title: Register Now
registration.subtitle: Secure your spot at JengaHacks 2026. Limited to 200 participants.
registration.whyCollect: We use this information to connect you with hiring companies and sponsors who are looking for talented participants like you.
registration.optionalWhatsApp: Optional - We'll use this to contact you about the event
registration.success: Registration successful! We'll be in touch soon.

errors.fullNameInvalid: Please enter a valid full name (2-100 characters, letters and spaces only)
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.whatsappInvalid: Please enter a valid WhatsApp number (e.g., +254712345678 or 0712345678)
errors.linkedinInvalid: Please enter a valid LinkedIn URL (e.g., linkedin.com/in/yourprofile)
errors.resumeRequired: Please provide either your LinkedIn profile or upload your resume
errors.resumeSize: File size must be less than 5MB
errors.resumeType: Please upload a PDF file (.pdf extension required)
errors.captchaFailed: CAPTCHA verification failed. Please try again.
errors.rateLimit: Too many registration attempts. Please try again after {time}.

registration.terms: By registering, you agree to our terms and conditions. We'll never share your information without consent.

sponsorship.connectDescription: Connect with 200+ talented developers, designers, and innovators building the future of East Africa's tech ecosystem.
sponsorship.talentPipelineDesc: Access top developers and designers from East Africa's leading universities before they hit the job market.
sponsorship.brandVisibilityDesc: Position your company as an innovation leader in the growing East African tech ecosystem.
sponsorship.freshIdeasDesc: See innovative solutions to real problems built in just 48 hours by passionate young developers.
sponsorship.questionsDescription: Have questions or need a custom package? We'd love to hear from you.
